title: Modem System Test Engineer

description: We expect you to be hands-on relying upon diagnostics, analytics, lab/field experimentations as well as code/architecture review to exploit the opportunities for improvement and work multi-functionally with platform architecture, standardization, firmware/protocol development, system test & carrier engineering teams to drive the improvement proposals and baseband optimizations. Our members enjoy the flexibility to be involved in all aspects of Protocol software - PHY, RF, SIM, NAS, AS, IP, TCP/UDP and iOS interfaces, to ensure the most robust and customer friendly software. If you are passionate about cellular technologies, then we are looking for you! As part of this team you'll be impacting iPhone user experience in 100+ countries by engaging in continuous process improvements for a well tested and robust software. This position involves defining and developing new test scenarios to exercise different aspect of 4G/5G cellular modem, executing tests, analyzing results and failures and identifying issues and optimizations to improve user experience.
key_qualifications: 2+ years of hands-on experience in cellular wireless communications, with a demonstrated ability to apply theoretical knowledge to practical problem-solving. Understanding of signal processing techniques such as OFDMA/CDMA and their application in communication systems is desired. Experience working with 4G and/or 5G  technologies, including 3GPP protocol standards and network architecture.Good 3GPP specification knowledge from any of L1/L2/RRC/NAS. Proficiency in any 1 of the programming languages such as C/C++ is preferred. Excellent knowledge & experience in Automation and scripting skills using Python ,Perl, Shell is a plus. Proven track record of innovation, with a preference for candidates who have demonstrated the ability to think creatively and propose novel solutions to technical challenges. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze and troubleshoot complex technical issues. Effective communication skills and the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams.
education_experience: Bachelors/Master Degree in Computer Science, Electronics & communication Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent experience. PhD, BTech, or post-graduate degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering ( EE/ECE) or a related field is a plus
